BBjGridExWidget.Client

Class BBjGridExWidgetClientFilterCombinedModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BBjGridExWidget.Client.BBjGridExWidgetClientFilterAbstractModel
      • BBjGridExWidget.Client.BBjGridExWidgetClientFilterCombinedModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BBjGridExWidgetClientFilterModel

    public class BBjGridExWidgetClientFilterCombinedModel
extends BBjGridExWidgetClientFilterAbstractModel
    A filter a which wraps two filter models and combine them with an `OR` or `AND` operator
    Author:
    Hyyan Abo Fakher
